ingredients.content: 1 orange, thin peelings of skin and juice
300 g green asparagus, woody ends removed, cut in pieces

preparations.content: Place orange zest and salt in mixing bowl then grind <b>10 sec/speed 10<b>. Transfer to a bowl and set aside.
Place asparagus and water in mixing bowl then cook <b>10 min/100°C/speed 1<b>.
Add reserved ground orange zest and orange juice then blend <b>30 sec/speed 10<b>.  Sprinkle with ground black pepper and serve immediately.
